verses.verse: And it came to pass after <S%H310>this<s%>, that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H2586>Hanun<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, If the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> be too <S%H2388>strong<s%> for me, then thou shalt <S%H3444>help<s%> me: but if the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> be too <S%H2388>strong<s%> for thee, then I will <S%H1980>come<s%> and <S%H3467>help<s%> thee.

¶ And when the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, they <S%H622>gathered<s%> themselves <S%H3162>together<s%>.
